name: Crappy Black Hole
description:
• Q to decrease amount of planets
  • E to increase amount of planets
  • W/A/S/D or arrow keys to move up/down/left/right
  • Hold Space to pull/suck, Release to let go

This is a little mini-game I made for a uni class a bit after the picture of the black hole was taken and publicised.

I used the actual picture in the game, so all credit to Katie Bouman for that.

Anyway, have fun.
